markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Wilderness Survival](/Actions.aspx?ID=1483) <actions string="" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Camping" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=465" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 24</row>

</column>

---

_Nethys note: This camping activity requires that Ekundayo is camping with the PCs (but see [Learn from a Companion](/Actions.aspx?ID=1477))._

Ekundayo attempts to bolster efforts to cook campfire meals or treating illness by gathering herbs from the campsite's environs. Any attempts to [Cook a Meal](/Rules.aspx?ID=1889) or [Treat Disease](/Actions.aspx?ID=55) gain a +1 item bonus during this camping session. If the party level is 11 or higher, the bonus increases to +2
name: Wilderness Survival
